mapper.sql: CERT_APPLY_ID, MEMBER_ID, APPLY_TYPE, NAME, CERT_TYPE, CERT_CODE, STATUS, APPLY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_MEMBER_ID, CREATE_ACCT_ID, CREATE_NAME, APPROVE_ACCT_ID, APPROVE_NAME, APPROVE_MEMBER_ID, AUDIT_TIME, APPROVE_DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into individual_cert_apply
MEMBER_ID, APPLY_TYPE, NAME, CERT_TYPE, CERT_CODE, STATUS, APPLY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_MEMBER_ID, CREATE_ACCT_ID, CREATE_NAME, APPROVE_ACCT_ID, APPROVE_NAME, APPROVE_MEMBER_ID, AUDIT_TIME, APPROVE_DESC,
#{memberId}, #{applyType}, #{name}, #{certType}, #{certCode}, #{status}, #{applyTime}, #{createTime}, #{createMemberId}, #{createAcctId}, #{createName}, #{approveAcctId}, #{approveName}, #{approveMemberId}, #{auditTime}, #{approveDesc},
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(bu.ACCT_ID) FROM busi_acct_info bu LEFT JOIN rela_member_to_acct rel ON bu.ACCT_ID = rel.ACCT_ID AND rel.MEMBER_TYPE = 3 LEFT JOIN INDIVIDUAL_CERT_APPLY apl ON rel.MEMBER_ID = apl.MEMBER_ID

SELECT apl.MEMBER_ID memberId , apl.CERT_APPLY_ID certApplyId , apl.APPLY_TYPE applyType , apl.CERT_TYPE certType , apl.CERT_CODE certCode , apl.`STATUS` `status` , apl.APPLY_TIME applyTime , apl.CREATE_TIME createTime , apl.CREATE_NAME createName , apl.APPROVE_ACCT_ID approveAcctId , apl.APPROVE_NAME approveName , apl.APPROVE_MEMBER_ID approveMemberId , apl.AUDIT_TIME auditTime , apl.APPROVE_DESC approveDesc ,
dtl.CERT_APPLY_DETAIL_ID certApplyDetailId , dtl.CERT_VALID_DATE certValidDate , dtl.sortNum sortNum
FROM INDIVIDUAL_CERT_APPLY apl LEFT JOIN individual_cert_apply_detail dtl ON apl.CERT_APPLY_ID = dtl.CERT_APPLY_ID
apl.CERT_APPLY_ID = #{certApplyId}

SELECT rel.MEMBER_ID memberId ,
bu.ACCT_ID acctId , bu.ACCT_NAME acctName , bu.ACCT_CODE acctCode , bu.ACCT_STATE acctState , bu.LOGO_URL logoUrl , bu.GENDER_TYPE genderType , bu.DEPT_ID deptId , bu.MOBILE_NUM mobileNum , bu.EMAIL email , bu.AREA_ID areaId , bu.AREA_ID_FULL_PATH areaIdFullPath , bu.AREA_NAME_FULL_PATH areaNameFullPath , bu.CONTACT_ADDR contactAddr , bu.POST_CODE postCode , bu.REGISTER_TIME registerTime ,
apl.CERT_APPLY_ID certApplyId , apl.APPLY_TYPE applyType , apl.`NAME` `name` , apl.CERT_TYPE certType , apl.CERT_CODE certCode , apl.`STATUS` `status` , apl.APPLY_TIME applyTime , apl.CREATE_TIME createTime , apl.CREATE_NAME createName , apl.APPROVE_ACCT_ID approveAcctId , apl.APPROVE_NAME approveName , apl.APPROVE_MEMBER_ID approveMemberId , apl.AUDIT_TIME auditTime , apl.APPROVE_DESC approveDesc ,
dtl.CERT_APPLY_DETAIL_ID , dtl.CERT_VALID_DATE FROM INDIVIDUAL_CERT_APPLY apl LEFT JOIN individual_cert_apply_detail dtl ON apl.CERT_APPLY_ID = dtl.CERT_APPLY_ID LEFT JOIN rela_member_to_acct rel ON apl.MEMBER_ID = rel.MEMBER_ID AND rel.MEMBER_TYPE = 3 LEFT JOIN busi_acct_info bu ON rel.ACCT_ID = bu.ACCT_ID
where apl.CERT_APPLY_ID = null
and apl.CERT_APPLY_ID = #{certApplyId} and apl.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
